tts_expanded_explanation.english: We use five senses to understand the world: eyes, ears, nose, tongue, and skin.
tts_expanded_explanation.telugu: Manam world ni artham chesukovadaniki five senses vadutam: eyes, ears, nose, tongue, and skin.
tts_expanded_explanation.hindi: Hum duniya ko samajhne ke liye five senses ka upyog karte hain: eyes, ears, nose, tongue, and skin.
tts_expanded_explanation.marathi: Aamhi jag samajhun ghenyasathi five senses vaparto: eyes, ears, nose, tongue, and skin.
tts_expanded_explanation.tamil: Ulagai purindhukollavum five senses payanpaduthugiroam: eyes, ears, nose, tongue, and skin.
tts_expanded_explanation.kannada: Naavu prapanchavannu artha madikollalu five senses upayogisuttivi: eyes, ears, nose, tongue, and skin.
tts_expanded_explanation.malayalam: Lokam manasilakkan nammal five senses upayogikkunnu: eyes, ears, nose, tongue, and skin.
tts_expanded_explanation.bengali: Amra duniya bujhte five senses use kori: eyes, ears, nose, tongue, and skin.
tts_expanded_explanation.punjabi: Asi duniya nu samajhan layi five senses vartde haan: eyes, ears, nose, tongue, and skin.

average.point: Humans have five senses: sight, hearing, smell, taste, touch.

tts_expanded_explanation.english: Each sense organ has a special role and helps us stay safe and learn.
tts_expanded_explanation.telugu: Prathi sense organ ki oka special role undi mariyu manaki safety mariyu learning lo sahayam chestundi.
tts_expanded_explanation.hindi: Har sense organ ka ek khas role hota hai jo hame surakshit rakhta hai aur sikhata hai.
tts_expanded_explanation.marathi: Pratyek sense organ cha ek vishesh role asta jo aaplya surakshe ani shikshanat madat karto.
tts_expanded_explanation.tamil: Ovvoru sense organ kum thanithuva role irukkirathu, adhu nammai paadhukakkum matrum katrukollavum udhavum.
tts_expanded_explanation.kannada: Prathi sense organ ge visheshada role ide adu namma rakshane mattu kalikeyalli sahaya maduttade.
tts_expanded_explanation.malayalam: Ella sense organinum thanithuva role undu, athu nammale rakshikkukayum padippikkukayum cheyyunnu.
tts_expanded_explanation.bengali: Prottek sense organ er ekta bishesh role ache ja amader suraksha o shikshay shahajjo kore.
tts_expanded_explanation.punjabi: Har sense organ da apna khaas role hunda hai jo sanu surakhit rakhda hai te sikhaunda hai.

high.point: The brain integrates signals from all sense organs.

tts_expanded_explanation.english: The brain combines signals from all sense organs to understand the environment.
tts_expanded_explanation.telugu: Brain anni sense organs nundi vachina signals ni kalipi environment ni artham chesukuntundi.
tts_expanded_explanation.hindi: Dimaag sabhi sense organs se aane wale signals ko jodkar vatavaran ko samajhta hai.
tts_expanded_explanation.marathi: Brain sarva sense organs kadhun yenare signals ekatra karto ani paryavaran samajto.
tts_expanded_explanation.tamil: Brain ellaa sense organs il irundhu varum signals ai serthu soozhalai purindhukollum.
tts_expanded_explanation.kannada: Brain ella sense organs inda baruva signals annu seeri parisara arivannu tayarisuva.
tts_expanded_explanation.malayalam: Brain ella sense organs il ninnulla signals cherthu parisarathine manasilakkunnu.
tts_expanded_explanation.bengali: Mastishk shob sense organs theke asha signals ekotre kore poribesh bujhe.
tts_expanded_explanation.punjabi: Dimaag saare sense organs ton aunde signals nu jod ke mahol samajhda hai.

mcq.question: How many senses do humans have?
Which sense organ helps us smell?
Which sense organ helps the brain understand light?
